Name: Snake-a-roni
About the game: A couch co-op or couch multi-player game. Each player controls a snake and eats powerups to get longer. Snake Adventure A casual mode to roam and explore several different areas. Up to 4 Snakes for multiplayer. Eat to get longer, then find the door to the next area. You will meet many other snakes on your adventure. Watch out for the Mongoose! Snake Classic Classic game of single player snake. Eat to get longer. Avoid the walls and your tail. Get the high score! Snake Fight A competitive fight for who is the best snake. Up to 4 Snakes for multiplayer, with AI to fill in. Eat to get longer, and trap the other snakes! Update v1.0.1.0: Big fix for Control issues with Shift Key.
